title: Patient Educator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: Went to two interviews in hr building not in actual hospital..then recruiter said she'll set a zoom meeting with manager and never heard from her again.... Wasted my time and energy for nothing
Interview Questions: Went to 2 interviews then recruiter said she'll set a zoom meeting with manager and never heard from her again.

title: Events Marketing Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: The process was normal and easy, the interviewer started to ask questions and she was friendly and at the end she told me that I’m accepted. But honestly i got confused and surprised regarding salary wise
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for this vacancy?

title: Finance Internship Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: interview started good with easy questions, but started getting unexpected questions kind of not related to the job role offered, but overall needs good preparation and to expect the unexpected
Interview Questions: where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: HR-Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was online on zoom and after the inerview i asked the interviewer to took me a feed back , she didn't answer me at all She told me that she will answer in 2 weeks and i didn't get any answer
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself What did you do if all candidates are un qualified? What is recruitment cycle? What is hr functions?

title: Specialty Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions:
Phone Call > First technical > Second HR > Third Final interview with the CEO
A lot of waiting and repetitive questions with no structure.
This position was a trial and no one exactly knew the job description so it was misleading
Interview Questions: What is your current salary? :D

title: Time Management Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: Good and the HR wad respectable and did the technical interview and the HR interview at the same day , so they save our time, it was a good experience overall, but I didn't hear any feedback again
Interview Questions: tell me about your self, current job

title: Product Owner Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Very Bad, 
There is no organization
 I was given an appointment at first, but no one came in for the interview
Then they called and set another appointment
No one has responded to me.

title: Art Director/Graphic Designer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: recruitment negotiation with recommendation offer then technical interview with creative director and talking about what I'll support with some questions about how I create my designs and full prosses to make creative campaigns finally with marketing manager and questions about KPIs and management process
Interview Questions: recruitment negotiation with recommendation offer then technical interview with creative director and talking about what I'll support with some questions about how I create my designs and full prosses to make creative campaigns finally with marketing manager and questions about KPIs and management process

title: Medical Call Center Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: phone interview ask me to introduce my self and why i ideal to this job and why i left my job....if the customr becomes inactive how make them active...and tell me i accepted to make next interviw and tell me the salary ....umm and asked me about my place
Interview Questions: if the customr becomes inactive how make them active

title: Recruitment Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process take so long because you do a lot of interviews with senior, team leader, head, manager,  manager of your speciality and regional manager of your department
It's good they want to see every shortlisted candidates  but the problem that interview process take so long
Interview Questions: The only question was new for me when she asked me about recruitment KPIs.. It was so good to be asked such a question...

title: Content Creator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: They keep contacting me and offering jobs then never call me back. Each time they say I am accepted and go for a final interview then they never call back unless I call and then they say they offered it to another candidate even though they already told me I am accepted.
Interview Questions: They were basic questions nothing deeply technical

title: Medical Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions:
It was an overall good experience
The interviewer was professional yet friendly
Asking about personal information then work/training experiences then skills then mini case study
Then clarification of the job description and duties then discussing the salary
Interview Questions: What do you know about sales

title: Medical Call Center Agent Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions:
It was smooth, straight to the point and didn’t take too much time. 
There was a stimulation call over the phone which was very helpful to know the nature of the work. 
The HR was quite friendly and didn’t leave a single unanswered question.
Interview Questions:
Introduce your self in brief. 
The biggest challenges that faced me. 
What will you add to the office. 
Are you familiar with gulf region accents.

title: Quality Assurance Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions:
It was a professional process and I really enjoyed my interview. 
All the questions were simple and professional and it was all an enriching process.
Overall it was a smooth interview and I went to the second interview and I was accepted.
Interview Questions: Talk about your experience as a telesales

they welcome me at first then i have exam for two hours

your experience
expected salary

title: Accountant Interview

title: Medical Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services

title: Buisness Intelligence Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was my first interview so i can't really tell how it was, but I benefited a lot and the interviewer gave me enough time for everything, we both knew I wasn't gonna get the job but she still gave me enough time to tell me about this career and some of the options I have, I wasn't accepted for the job but I never regretted going to that interview.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work as a bi developer?

title: Frontend Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very Bad Company for any developer with no respect for their effort and time with not organized hiring process from HR or UI team leader till the bad software management hiring decisions.
Interview Questions:
Task output will be the home page for a web site as the PSD with the following features:
 
-      Slider in the first section.
-      Parallax background in Our Services section and hover effect for icons.
-      Executives officers section click on the small pic to update content in the big pic.
-      Apply JS counter in the Statistics section.
-      Apply animated logos with linear effect stopped when click.
Rules & hints
-      Use vue.js or Angular as a SPA framework.
-      Responsive web page.
-      Handling Multi-Language ( AR – EN )
-      Handling multiple browsers
-      Handling lazy loading.
-      Handling performance issues.
-      Pay attention to code quality, formatting, conventions, solution structure, etc.
-      Using CSS preprocessor (Sass with SCSS syntax strongly preferred)
 
You will implement any 70% only from task requirements in 3 days if you need any extra time or any questions kindly contact us.

title: Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: The process was extremely straight forward it fast replies no tough questions and overall clear process lasted for about 2 interviews 49 mins each on zoom platform with ni typed coding questions and I did not have to open the camera
Interview Questions: What was your title in your previous company

title: Recruitment Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions:
So unprofessional, genetic questions (the kind of where do you see yourself in 5 years)
They communicated a package during the interview process and while offering they send something way way less than agreed, I do not reccomend them at all
Interview Questions: Random generic old school questions.

title: Visiting Doctors Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Maadi Cornish) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: I had to wait in a room among other interviewees all cramped up in a separate building and the HR seemed to know nothing about the job itself as she needed the regional manager to continue
Interview Questions: My expected salary as an all inclusive

title: IT Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate)
Interview Descriptions:
They lack the respect to their appointments with candidates, doesn't have a proper process to handle the interview or to have a clear vision on upcoming steps.
Also, their Suadian CEO is not respectful as he is dealing with candidate from his point of view that we are in need to his job and salary as well.
Interview Questions: Normal interview questions

title: Regional Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Too many interviews and at the end one-man-show decision making by the company owner (CEO). 
The CEO is very aggressive during the interview.
The job offer title was has been changed than the submitted title.
Very low job offer far below the average.
Interview Questions:
Headcounts?
How many people you are managing?
How many projects you are managing?
How much budget you are managing?

title: Digital Marketing Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: the interview was easy, it was a technical interview, and the interviewer was good. it was one interview with the manager. and the HR interview was through phone previous the second interview
Interview Questions: Technical Questions about my previous work

title: HR Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: firstly you will picture old furniture and got the impression of a Governmental style, they way of hiring is mass recruiting which leads to basic questions but welcoming people. need to be more organized.
Interview Questions: Basic questions

title: Technical Writer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: HR, IQ then technical. The HR was great, the interviewer was really professional and respectful. The IQ test was MCQ, they said 30 minutes but they left me alone for more than 45 minutes ans without supervision so I had to go out of the room and search for them to gove my answer sheet. I didn't like the Technical interview, the way I was treated was bad because I was still undergrad and had some experience, the interviewer was like making fun of me
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself

title: Human Resources Specialty Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services
Interview Descriptions: Unprofessional call- followed by 2 interviews,a panel HR  interview, then a technical interview, they almost stumble when it comes to the salary question, they asked me over the phone about my salary and they are willing to let take less, they keep the salary issue very secretive, they look unprofessional and disorganized,  the most prevailing thing is un-transparency and secretiveness
Interview Questions: How much can you sacrifice your salary?

title: Finance Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Unprofessional, clumsy interview process.
No coordination between Recruiters, as few ones can call you for the same available position.
 No professional introduction about the role objective or even the interviewer position.
Cocky, aggressive manager with unprofessional attitude.
Interview Questions: Tell me how to prepare the satatury accounts.

title: Visiting Doctors Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: reliable questions, to the core of the job responsibilities. No where-do-you-think-you-will-be-in-5-years sort of questions. I was freely allowed to talk about my academic & professional experiences. No feel of inferiority some interviewers embark on you.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose these numbers for min. salary and acceptable salary?

title: Senior Software Implementer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: you will face 3 interviews .. HR - technical and then with the hiring manager and you should be prepared with SQL and some business skills like supply chain or overall healthcare business

I got the impression that they are pooling candidates and they don't need more employees right now

title: Finance Manager Interview

title: Senior Software Engineer Interview

title: BI Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Andalusia for Medical Services (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Feb 2017

what project did you do as a BI developer? in details?

title: Human Resources Manager Interview

title: Human Resources Manager Interview

I really completely shocked and called the recruitment manager at this time she shocked too actually and it was a disaster for me.
